column6: When Santa and his Reindeer have a little fender-bender with the Helicarrier, The Squaddies pitch in to make sure Christmas goes off without a hitch. Sort of... Join your favorite heroes for a holiday you'll never forget! 32 PGS./All Ages ...$2.99
column8: | penciller:Dario Brizuela | penciller:Marcelo DiChiara | writer:Todd Dezago
